page.title: 15Day in Life of a Post Man
page.content: Mr N is a{postman.}He starts work at 7.20 am at the{post office}in{Bolton {Abbey}to sort the letters into order. Next he starts{delivering letters, postcards, parcels, bills, magazines, adverts. There are about 500 letters a week, more at{Christmas,}to 50 houses. They come from all over the world. Every body gets letters some times. People like getting letters but not bills. He stops to talk because that is one of the pleasures of the job. After work he mows the cricket pitch and he has lots of{hobbies especially stamp collecting. He has been late because of bad weather in winter. There is another postman who delivers in Bolton Abbey and Beamsley. Delivering letters runs in the family, father 60 years, mother 27 years, Mr N 17 years.
